entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries.
